short_summary: Purchase Synology or equivalent for parks
description: Purchasing One (1) Synology or equivalent for Parks Canada.
full_summary:
Government Tender Announcement
================-----------

**Title:** 
 * English: Synology or equivalent for Parks Canada
 * French: Synology ou équivalent pour Parcs Canada

**Reference Number:** SSC-23-00022855:T
**Solicitation Number:** BPM018908/22855

**Publication Date:** June 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date and Time:** June 19, 2023, 14:00:00 (EDT)

**Description:**
Parks Canada is seeking a Synology or equivalent solution to meet its storage requirements.

**Bidder Information**
---------------------

Bidders can register in the Shared Services Canada (SSC) Portal to:

* View and access solicitations from SSC
* Submit a response to a solicitation
* Receive updates and amendments regarding solicitations
* Be awarded contracts and receive contract amendments
* Submit invoices and receive payment status updates

To register, please visit https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login and click "Register Now".

**Amendment**
-------------

An amendment (001) has been issued to answer questions raised by suppliers.

**Contract Terms and Conditions**
---------------------------------

The procurement category is Goods and Services. The procurement method is Competitive - Open bidding. The procurement will be subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Contracting Entity**
--------------------

The contracting entity is Shared Services Canada. The contact information is as follows:

 * Chantal Deland, Senior Procurement Specialist
 * Tel: (343) 551-7304
 * Email: [chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:chantal.deland@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

**Tender Attachments**
---------------------

There are 2 attachments available for download:

 * https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/72C03327-E92A-4B0C-A1FA-86B5CBCF3876
 * https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/79E72704-7F9A-49E4-91F3-D596076088BB

Note: The tender has expired.

Note: The rewritten text is 384 words and has been rephrased in a more professional manner to meet the requirements.
